text: is a Japanese rower. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Japan Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Hideaki Maeguchi
